lead_paragraph: The only way Real Madrid can salvage a troubled season is to overturn their 2-0 Champions League deficit in Tuesday's return match against VfL Wolfsburg, said coach Zinedine Zidane.

headline.print_headline: Real Out to Save Season Against Wolfsburg, Says Zidane
headline.main: Real Out to Save Season Against Wolfsburg, Says Zidane
